author: Ariel Bogle
title: How to optimise your internet while coronavirus forces you to stay at home
description: Australia's internet is under pressure, but there are steps you can try to improve your connection at home.
content:
Steve Dalby was once a telecommunication executive, but even he took matters into his own hands in the pursuit of good internet.
When the former iiNet chief regulatory officer moved onto the NBN, the new router ended up in the laundry cupboard and it wasn't … [+5540 chars]
